channel.title: This is rare
channel.description:
i got scoure where monsters dropping stuff but in npcdrops.cfg are no drops like black draogn its dropping a whip but its not in npcdrops.cfg how i can edit the drops now??? :confused:
i never have tings like this
ragean

item.title: This is rare
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

[b]if(npcs[i].npcType == 2026)[/b]

Thats adding a NPC to that file. And making it drop…

[b]ItemHandler.addItem(Item3.randomDharok(), npcs.absX, npcs.absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(i), false);[/b]

Kai.

If you didn’t have…

if(npcs[i].npcType == 2026)

Which is telling the server what kind of npc it is. Which is basically like adding a NPC. Then it would give errors, or wouldn’t work at all.

Read full topic

ItemHandler.addItem(Item3.randomDharok(), npcs[i].absX, npcs[i].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(i), false);
how does that add an npc??? ITEMHANDLER not NPCHANDLER dude.

Lol dude? it doesnt add a new NPC… It adds an item where the NPC died.

item.title: This is rare
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

[quote=“Baybee, post:5, topic:153600”]You have to edit in NPCHandler.java too.
Find

if(npcs[i].npcType == 2026) { ItemHandler.addItem(Item3.randomDharok(), npcs[i].absX, npcs[i].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(i), false); },
edit the NPC ID to your desired ID and ItemHandler.

Hope that helped.[/quote]

Haider, hes not on about adding a new npc. Or adding new drops, please read his post. Tanx.

Hav a nise day

Read full topic

item.title: This is rare
item.dc:creator: @Baybee Baybee
item.description:
@Baybee wrote:

You have to edit in NPCHandler.java too.
Find

if(npcs[i].npcType == 2026) { ItemHandler.addItem(Item3.randomDharok(), npcs[i].absX, npcs[i].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(i), false); },
edit the NPC ID to your desired ID and ItemHandler.

Hope that helped.

Read full topic

item.title: This is rare
item.dc:creator: @Syrillia Syrillia
item.description:
@Syrillia wrote:

Go to item3.java. There should be something like this;

public static int Abbyssal[] = {4151, 592, 592, 592, 592};
    public static int randomAbbyssal()
    {
	return Abbyssal[(int)(Math.random()*Abbyssal.length)];
    }

Find the one related to the black dragon and edit it.

{4151, 592, 592, 592, 592};

This bit drop ashes 4/5 times but whip 1/5 times. change it to;

{4151, 592, 592};

to drop whip 1/3 times. Ect.

Also, change 4151 to the ItemID you want or whatever.

Read full topic
